summary: A comprehensive pytest suite that validates the functionality of the MODFLOW Surface‑Water (MSW) modeling components, covering data mapping, grid handling, initial conditions, land‑use integration, meteorological grids, infiltration, evapotranspiration, precipitation, scaling factors, ponding, sprinkling, output control, and overall model utilities.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the MSW modeling toolkit, enabling reliable water‑resources simulations and supporting ongoing development and maintenance of the software.
